channel.title: Bug in whonix_repository tool
channel.description:
[html]

In case you want to disable Whonix’s apt repository, you need the fixed version of the whonix_repository tool. Documentation about this topic has been updated: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Trust

[/html]

[html]

In case you want to disable Whonix’s apt repository, you need the fixed version of the whonix_repository tool. Documentation about this topic has been updated:
